# AI Workflows Documentation

This document provides a technical overview of the various AI workflows implemented in the project using Genkit AI. Each workflow is defined as a `flow` and is designed to perform specific tasks related to content creation and management.

## 1. Chat Workflow (`chat-flow.ts`)

*   **Purpose:** To handle interactive conversations with the user, acting as a simple chatbot.
*   **Input:** `ChatInput` - An object containing a `message` (string) from the user.
*   **Output:** `ChatOutput` - An object containing a `response` (string) generated by the AI.

## 2. Description Generation Workflow (`generate-description-flow.ts`)

*   **Purpose:** To create a short and engaging description for a blog post based on its content.
*   **Input:** `GenerateDescriptionInput` - An object containing the `content` (Markdown string) of the blog post.
*   **Output:** `GenerateDescriptionOutput` - An object containing the generated `description` (string).

## 3. Post Generation Workflow (`generate-post-flow.ts`)

*   **Purpose:** To generate the full content of a blog post, including a title and a featured image.
*   **Input:** `GeneratePostInput` - An object containing a `title` (string) for the blog post.
*   **Output:** `GeneratePostOutput` - An object containing the `description` (string), `content` (HTML string), and `imageUrl` (data URI string).

## 4. Tag Generation Workflow (`generate-tags-flow.ts`)

*   **Purpose:** To suggest relevant SEO tags for a blog post based on its title and content.
*   **Input:** `GenerateTagsInput` - An object containing the `title` (string) and `content` (HTML or text string).
*   **Output:** `GenerateTagsOutput` - An object containing an array of `tags` (array of strings).

## 5. Text Translation Workflow (`translate-text-flow.ts`)

*   **Purpose:** To translate a set of texts into a specified target language.
*   **Input:** `TranslateTextInput` - An object containing `texts` (a JSON object of identifiers to text) and a `targetLanguage` (string).
*   **Output:** `TranslateTextOutput` - An object containing `translations` (a JSON object with the same keys but with translated values).
